meanings.definition: The collective power or influence of women in society.
meanings.sent1: The womanpower of the group helped bring positive changes to the community.
meanings.sent2: She felt the womanpower of her female colleagues as they worked together towards a common goal.
meanings.sent3: The womanpower at the charity event made sure everyone had a great time.
meanings.sent4: Her womanpower shone brightly in the boardroom, guiding the team towards success.
meanings.sent5: The womanpower of the team was like a beacon of hope in the community.

meanings.definition: The energy, strength, or ability possessed by women.
meanings.sent1: Her womanpower helped her complete the marathon with ease.
meanings.sent2: The womanpower of the athletes was evident in their impressive performance.
meanings.sent3: She used her womanpower to lift the heavy boxes effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: The womanpower of the team fueled their determination to reach the summit.
meanings.sent5: Her womanpower was like a source of endless motivation for those around her.
